summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with a structure.

param.name: o
param.para: Type: const
Address of the structure that initializes the CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC structure.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with values.

param.name: viewDimension
param.para: Type:
A -typed value that specifies the depth-stencil type of the view.

param.name: format
param.para: Type:
A -typed value that specifies the viewing format.

param.name: mipSlice
param.para: Type: UINT
The index of the mipmap level to use mip slice.

param.name: firstArraySlice
param.para: Type: UINT
The index of the first element to use in an array of elements.

param.name: arraySize
param.para: Type: UINT
Number of elements in the array.

param.name: flags
param.para: Type: UINT
A value that describes whether the texture is read only. Pass 0 to specify that it is not read only; otherwise, pass one of the members of the enumerated type.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with D3D11_TEX1D_DSV or D3D11_TEX1D_ARRAY_DSV values.

param.name: pTex1D
param.para: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture1D interface for a 1D texture.

param.name: viewDimension
param.para: A D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION-typed value that specifies the depth-stencil type of the view.

param.name: format
param.para: A DXGI_FORMAT-typed value that specifies the viewing format.

param.name: mipSlice
param.para: The index of the mipmap level to use mip slice.

param.name: firstArraySlice
param.para: The index of the first element to use in an array of elements.

param.name: arraySize
param.para: Number of elements in the array.

param.name: flags
param.para: A value that describes whether the texture is read only. Pass 0 to specify that it is not read only; otherwise, pass one of the members of the D3D11_DSV_FLAG enumerated type.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of a CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC structure that is initialized with 2D texture values.

param.name: pTex2D
param.para: A pointer to a ID3D11Texture2D.

param.name: viewDimension
param.para: A D3D11_DSV_DIMENSION-typed value that specifies the depth-stencil type of the view.

param.name: format
param.para: A DXGI_FORMAT-typed value that specifies the viewing format.

param.name: mipSlice
param.para: The index of the mipmap level to use mip slice.

param.name: firstArraySlice
param.para: The index of the first element to use in an array of elements.

param.name: arraySize
param.para: Number of elements in the array.

param.name: flags
param.para: A value that describes whether the texture is read only. Pass 0 to specify that it is not read only; otherwise, pass one of the members of the D3D11_DSV_FLAG enumerated type.

summary.para: Instantiates a new instance of an uninitialized CD3D11_DEPTH_STENCIL_VIEW_DESC structure.
